question: The First International Conference on Sports Medicine and Sports Sciences SAICON 2017 was inaugurated in __________.
explanation: he First International Conference on Sports Medicine and Sports Sciences SAICON 2017 was inaugurated in New Delhi by the Minister of State (I/C) Youth Affairs and Sports Col. Rajyavardhan Rathore. The SAICON 2017 will promote scientific temperament in the country and inspire students, researchers and educationists alike to take up sports science and research to the next level. It was Organized by Sports Authority of India, the 3-day conference is being attended by about 1000 national and international delegates.
